ygData.subject: Re: Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: James Schuldes  ... heh, you didn t have to give her the 550 gold coins?  I had no idea at the time, so I had to leave some of my
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "James Schuldes" <jgs@...>

> I have heard that you can do this. FYI - rumor and hearsay - not actually
> see this work.
>
> Sylly
>
> p.s. 550 gold coins? Bah - take this plat and like it!

heh, you didn't have to give her the 550 gold coins? I had no idea at the
time, so I had to leave some of my armor at home so I wasn't too encumbered.
:) For my 2nd bracer, though, I didn't need to buy the fire opals, as
someone had sold a lambent fire opal to a merchant near the bank in
Freeport, which I was able to purchase for 105pp. Saved myself 5pp and a
lambent stone. :) I still have no idea why they sold it to the merchant,
though I'm glad they did. :)

-Gaelaian Galaenor, still of the 22nd song, after about 5 weeks, mostly due
to being bored and playing other characters, Tunare.
